description: This course introduces students to a new methodological approach to the writing of history that has become increasingly popular in the last ten years and tells big stories about the world small things. Students will also get their hands dirty by writing their own global microhistories.
title: Global Microhistory
prerequisite: Year 1 and 2 Common Curriculum modules and at least one module in History at 2000 level and any one module in History at 3000 level.
